About the Company: Rasoya Proteins Ltd is engaged in the Business of Solvent Extraction and Oil Refinery.The Company has been selling Soya Refined Oil under the brand name Rasoya.The Product range of the company includes:Soya,De Oiled Cakes,Solvent Oil,Refined Edible soy Oil,Soya Namkin (Ready to Eat Snack Food),Wheat Atta,Jawar Atta,Besan,Soya Wadi,Nuggets and Oil in Various Packs.The company has entered into Power Purchase Agreement with Tata Power Trading Company Limited for sale of surplus power from the captive power unit and has received license to operate mundi for procurement of agricultural produce from farmers..The company also in the business segment of Power, Soya Based Products.
